author: glenn
msg: Applied the patch provided by Jim Rudnicki, thanks Jim!
It looks like it fixes the problem I had reported earlier
with the following exception being throw sometimes:
The patch makes sure that the response and request get
recycled if finish() throws an Exception.
java.lang.IllegalStateException: OutputStream is already being used for this request
